title: Naan Nee Naam Vazhave Lyrics Madras Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Naan Nee
Singer(s): Shakthisri Gopalan, Dheekshitha
Movie: Madras (2014)
Music: Santhosh Narayanan
Lyrics: Umadevi
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Naan nee naam vazhave - urave
nee naan naam thondrinom uyire
Thaaga poovum naanthaaney.
poovin dhaagam neethaaney.

Naan paravayin vaanam
palagida vaa vaa neeyum.
naan analidum vegam
anaithida vaa neeyum.

Thaaga poovum naanthaaney.
poovin dhaagam neethaaney.

Uyir vazha ulkooda
oru paravayin
veedaai maaridumey.
Uyire
un paadhai malaraagum.

Nadhi vazhum meen kooda
oru naalil
kadali serndhidumey.
meeney
kadalaaga azhaikindren.

Thaaga poovum naanthaaney.
poovin dhaagam neethaaney.

Anal kaayum paraiyosai
orr vazhvin
geetham aagidumey
anbae
 malaraadha nenjam engae.

Vali theerkkum un kannil
orr kadhal
azhagaai thondridumey.
anbae nee vaaraayo.

Thaaga poovum naanthaaney.
poovin dhaagam neethaaney.

Naan nee naam vazhave - urave
nee naan naam thondrinom uyire
Thaaga poovum naanthaaney.
poovin dhaagam neethaaney.

Naan paravayin vaanam
palagida vaa vaa neeyum.
naan analidum vegam
anaithida vaa neeyum.

Thaaga poovum naanthaaney.
poovin dhaagam neethaaney.

 English Translation
I tried my best :)
Myself, you and we, to live
you, myself and we took birth
I am a thirsty flower
you are this flower’s thirst.

I am bird’s sky
come to me to live
I am speed of fire
come to diffuse it.

I am a thirsty flower
you are this flower’s thirst.

to live, even thorn
will help bird
to built nest
my love,
you way is full of flowers

Fish, which lives in river
will reach
sea one day.
hey fish
am calling like a seac.

I am a thirsty flower
you are this flower’s thirst.

a heated drum ,
it will become a
song for a human life.
honey - where is your
unblossomed heart ?

In your eye that relieves pain
a love
will show up beautifully.
come to me baby.

I am a thirsty flower
you are this flower’s thirst.

Myself, you and we, to live
you, myself and we took birth
I am a thirsty flower
you are this flower’s thirst.

I am bird’s sky
come to me to live
I am heat of fire
come to diffuse it.

I am a thirsty flower
you are this flower’s thirst.
